scripts.watch-develop: npm run build-js && nodemon --watch . -e css node_modules/.bin/postcss src/styles.css -o ../assets/styles.css
scripts.watch-build: npm run build-js && NODE_ENV=production nodemon --watch . --watch ../templates -e js,mjs,json,css,html node_modules/.bin/postcss src/styles.css -o ../assets/styles.css
scripts.build-js: npm run vendor-htmx && npm run vendor-alpine
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
